parsed.explanation: Fixed 3 main issues: 1) Corrected malformed characters (√ symbols were incorrectly representing umlauts and other letters - replaced with proper German characters like ü, ß, ä); 2) Fixed missing closing BIBL tag after "sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum"; 3) Standardized format notation "8v√≤" to proper "8vo" (octavo format). The XML structure was otherwise sound.
